amendment.description: Amendment provides $3 million for preventive measures under the Watershed Protection and Flood Prevention Act and the Soil Conservation and Domestic Allotment Act.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to provide $3 million for preventive measures under the Watershed Protection and Flood Prevention Act and the Soil Conservation and Domestic Allotment Act.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hirono amendment (A051) Agreed to by recorded vote: 288 - 132 (Roll no. 450).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Hirono amendment (A051) Agreed to by recorded vote: 288 - 132 (Roll no. 450).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A051) offered by Ms. Hirono.
